title: T201 Mecca Double Folders Set For Sale
author: rommesc

posts.post_title: T201 Mecca Double Folders Set For Sale
posts.post_content:
Full 50 card set of T201 Mecca Double Folder cards.  29 of the cards in the set are ungraded and 21 are graded.  Price is $2650 net to me, shipping included.  Cards and condition are listed below.  Some of the cards include wet sheet transfer, missing color pass, and miscuts as noted.  Pictures are available upon request.
